title: U.S. Citizens Sign Petition to Ban the American Flag & Issue a New Design

embed.description: U.S. Citizens Sign Petition to Ban American Flag and Issue New Design for the New World Order! Media analyst Mark Dice asked beachgoers in San Diego to sign a petition he said would result in issuing a new American flag for a "New World Order" because the current one is offensive to some immigrants and is associated with imperialism and racism.

body:
I know I suggested replacing the American Flag and replace it with the LGBT flag in a thread of mine to show how dumb it is to ban the Confederate flag because, just like the Confederacy, America has also done terrible things in the past (and still does terrible things today), but this is just ridiculous.

These young college-age uneducated dumb liberal hippy douchers who watch crap like The Daily Show and pretend it's actual unbiased news will rule America one day once the old protectors of justice, liberty, and the Constitution in office eventually die out :/
